JUST REDUCED!! FULLY RENOVATED 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT ON PRIME LEXINGTON AVE, 1 BLOCK FROM THE 6 TRAIN ON 103 ST, THE APARTMENT FACING SOUTH, SUPER BRIGHT. FULL SIZE KITCHEN, MARBLE BATHROOM. THE BUILDING HAS A BACK YARD WITH BBQ GRILL FOR THE TENANT USE ONLY. LAUNDRY AND DRY CLEANING ON THE GROUND FLOOR.

FOR VIEWING PLEASE CONTACT EXCLUSIVE BROKER TOMER MEIR AT 917.860.4004 Owner will pay 1/2 of the broker fee.
